overview: TransSensual offers you a new taboo series, My Best Friends TS Girlfriend. 4 gorgeous TS women expose themselves by cheating on their boyfriends with their best friends. Ricky's (Ricky Larkin) best friend is out of town and he offers to bring Andrea (Andrea Zhay) to an art exhibit, but she had other plans in mind for the night. Wesley's (Wesley Woods) buddy suspects his girlfriend Eva (Eva Paradis) will cheat on him. So, he asks him to seduce her and see if she's faithful. Jane (Jane Marie) is preparing the apartment for the homecoming tomorrow. Pierce (Pierce Paris) helps her to make sure that everything goes well for his best friend. Finally, Daisy (Daisy Taylor) will meet her boyfriends best friend, but the night doesn't go the way it was supposed to. He winds up leaving his stunning girlfriend with his best friend Dante (Dante Colle).
title: My Best Friend's TS Girlfriend
